title: Naomi and Ruth: Love and Loyalty
description:
Readings from:
Ruth 1:1-2a, 3-5, 8-9a, 16-17, 22
Today's passages were read by Quinn Brewer. Quinn and his wife, Emily, are on staff with Cornerstone Church at Illinois State University.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
